mapper.select: SELECT NO ,WRITER_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,STATUS FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT N.NO ,WRITER_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,STATUS ,ATTACH_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_ATTACHMENT NA ON NA.NOTICE_NO = N.NO WHERE N.NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NO ,WRITER_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL ,1 ,#{title} ,#{content} )

INSERT INTO NOTICE_ATTACHMENT ( NO , NOTICE_NO ,ATTACH_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_ATTACHMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , (SELECT NO FROM (SELECT NO FROM NOTICE WHERE ROWNUM = '1' ORDER BY NO DESC)) , #{attachName} )
mapper.select: SELECT NO ,NOTICE_NO ,WRITER_NO ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,DELETE_YN FROM NOTICE_REPLY WHERE NOTICE_NO=#{no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
